description.value:
Your biological circuitry emits light like a torch, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). The light shuts off when you take this action again or are knocked @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious}.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Radiant Circuitry]{Effect: Radiant Circuitry}
